title: SNAP & SHINE ALONG ORCHARD ROAD Photo Spots
blurb: Discover dazzling photo spots along Orchard Road!
description: Explore a trail of festive photo opportunities along Orchard Road, perfect for capturing Instagram-worthy moments. Visit Santa’s Trishaw Sleigh in front of Shaw House Urban Plaza for a Singaporean Christmas photo. Shine under the Glittering Archway in front of ION Orchard. Pose beneath the Festive Arch of Wonder in front of Wisma Atria. Join Merli and friends inside the Wreath of Joy in front of Ngee Ann City. Rediscover the Magical Dragon Playground in front of Mandarin Gallery, lit up with festive wonder. These locations offer unique and memorable backdrops for holiday photos with family and friends.
datetime_display: friends inside a giant festive wreath — a joyful scene that captures the spirit of Christmas! Magical Dragon Playground (In front of Mandarin Gallery) Rediscover a piece of Singapore’s childhood charm as the beloved dragon playground lights up with festive wonder
keyword_tag: Christmas, photo spots, Orchard Road, festive, family, Instagram

title: Santa’s Trishaw Sleigh at Shaw House Urban Plaza
blurb: Hop aboard this charming festive trishaw for a photo!
description: Experience a uniquely Singaporean Christmas photo opportunity aboard Santa’s Trishaw Sleigh. This charming festive trishaw offers a delightful and memorable way to capture the holiday spirit. Located in front of Shaw House Urban Plaza, it's a perfect spot for families and individuals to create lasting Christmas memories. Enjoy the festive atmosphere and take advantage of this special photo opportunity during the Orchard Road Christmas celebrations. A fun and engaging activity for all ages, adding a touch of local charm to your holiday season.
keyword_tag: Christmas, Trishaw, Sleigh, Photo opportunity, Festive, Shaw House, Orchard Road

title: The Glittering Archway at ION Orchard
blurb: Shine under Orchard Road’s grand arch at this podium.
description: Experience the magic of Christmas under Orchard Road's grand arch at the Glittering Archway. Located in front of ION Orchard, this glittering photo podium provides the perfect backdrop for festive photos. Capture the sparkle and shine of the holiday season as you pose under the dazzling arch. This attraction is ideal for families, friends, and individuals looking to create memorable Christmas moments. Enjoy the vibrant atmosphere and make the most of this special photo opportunity during the Orchard Road Christmas celebrations. A fun and engaging activity for all ages.
keyword_tag: Christmas, Archway, Photo podium, Festive, ION Orchard, Orchard Road

It's an ideal destination for families looking to immerse themselves in the Christmas spirit and enjoy a fun, festive outing.

title: Magical Dragon Playground at Mandarin Gallery
blurb: Rediscover Singapore’s childhood charm with festive wonder.
description: The Magical Dragon Playground lights up with festive wonder, offering a nostalgic experience for families and children. Located in front of Mandarin Gallery, this iconic playground brings a piece of Singapore’s past to life during the Christmas season. Visitors can enjoy the beautifully decorated playground and create lasting memories. The playground is part of the Christmas on A Great Street celebration, which aims to unite communities in a shared spirit of togetherness. It's a perfect spot for families to take photos and enjoy the festive atmosphere. The playground is free to access and open to all ages, making it a great destination for a family outing during the holiday season. The Christmas light-up ceremony will be held at Ngee Ann City Civic Plaza.
keyword_tag: playground, dragon playground, christmas, festive, family, children, light-up, orchard road

title: Christmas on A Great Street Light-Up Ceremony 2025
blurb: Orchard Road transforms into a dazzling beacon of hope!
description: Join the Christmas on A Great Street Community Chest Light-Up Ceremony as Orchard Road transforms into a dazzling display. In partnership with SG Cares Giving Week and the Orchard Road Business Association (ORBA), this SG60 edition unites communities. The festive lights empower those in need through vital social service programs. Support SGSHARE, the national giving initiative, which funds programmes across five meaningful causes to uplift lives. With SG Gives, a government matching grant, every dollar counts. With collective kindness, we can help dreams take flight. Be part of a movement that empowers those in need.
keyword_tag: Christmas light up, community event, Orchard Road, festive celebration, SG Cares Giving Week

title: Kiztopia Christmas Carnival at Shaw House
blurb: Endless excitement awaits the whole family!
description: Get ready for endless excitement at the Kiztopia Christmas Carnival, where fun awaits the whole family! Enjoy a variety of carnival games, hop aboard the Reindeer Train or share giggles on the Parent & Child Rocking Car ride. Little ones can bounce their hearts out on the Trampoline, snap adorable photos with Kiztopia’s beloved characters and take home exclusive Kiztopia merchandise. Don’t forget to try your luck at the Fun Claw machines for a chance to win delightful prizes! Opening Hours: Mon – Thu: 3pm – 10pm Fri – Sun, NYE and Public Holidays: 2pm – 10pm Wed 24 Dec 2025: 2pm – 12.30am
datetime_display: Mon – Thu: 3pm – 10pm Fri – Sun, NYE and Public Holidays: 2pm – 10pm Wed 24 Dec 2025: 2pm – 12.30am
keyword_tag: Carnival games, Reindeer Train, Trampoline, Kiztopia characters

title: Great Christmas Village at Ngee Ann City Civic Plaza
blurb: Thrilling games, rides, photo ops, and festive cheer.
description: Celebrate the season at the newly revamped Great Christmas Village at Ngee Ann City Civic Plaza! Step into the Kiztopia Christmas Carnival, packed with thrilling new games, rides and adorable photo ops with fan-favourite characters Eli and Drago, all decked out in festive cheer. Capture magical memories at the Hitachi Santa House, a must-visit spot for picture-perfect moments. Explore the enchanting Christmas Village, featuring over 10 F&B and retail booths with irresistible treats, unique gifts and a merry bar by homegrown craft beer brand Sunbird Brewing Company. Don’t miss the live weekend performances that will fill the air with holiday magic and joy for the whole family! The spectacular 14-metre-tall Mastercard Christmas Tree takes centre stage once again — dazzling visitors with its brilliant lights and two magical snowfall shows every night, creating an unforgettable festive experience for all.
datetime_display: Mon – Thu: 3pm – 10pm Fri, Sat, Sun and Public Holidays: 12pm – 10pm Fri 5 Dec 2025 – Thu 1 Jan 2026: 12pm – 10pm Wed 24 Dec & Wed 31 Dec 2025: 12pm – 12.30am
keyword_tag: Christmas Village, Carnival, Games, Rides, Photo Ops, Performances
address_display: #08, 391A Orchard Rd, #5 Watsons Takashimaya S.C, Ngee Ann City +Pharmacy + GNC (Click & Collect), Singapore 238874

title: Outdoor Multimedia 3D Projection Show On Orchard
blurb: Catch a charming Christmas story with vivid visuals.
description: Enjoy a captivating 3D projection show that tells a charming Christmas story through vivid visuals. The show is perfect for families and children of all ages. On Christmas Eve and New Year’s Eve, stay on for a special midnight countdown with exclusive content to mark the occasion. The show runs daily from 7pm to 10pm, with extended hours until 12.30am on Christmas Eve and New Year's Eve. This family-friendly event offers a magical experience for all attendees.
datetime_display: 7pm – 10pm Daily | 7pm – 12.30pm Christmas Eve & New Year’S Eve
keyword_tag: 3D projection show, Christmas, family-friendly, Orchard Road, multimedia show

title: Music In The Air at Orchard Road Singapore
blurb: Soak in the festive cheer with Christmas tunes.
description: Enjoy Christmas tunes along Orchard Road. Pop-up events include Night At Orchard from November 28 – 30, 2025, Celebrate Christmas in Singapore from December 16 – 22, 2025, and Night At Orchard from December 26 – 28, 2025. These events bring Orchard Road to life with exciting activities and festive cheer for all visitors. Experience the magic of Christmas with music and pop-up events designed to create memorable moments for families and individuals alike. The vibrant atmosphere and engaging activities make Orchard Road a must-visit destination during the holiday season.
datetime_display: November 28 – 30 Nov 2025: Night At Orchard December 16 – 22 Dec 2025: Celebrate Christmas in Singapore 26 – 28 Dec 2025: Night At Orchard
keyword_tag: Christmas, Orchard Road, Music, Pop-up Events, Festive

title: Orchard Road Christmas Celebrations and Pop-Up Events
blurb: Exciting pop-up events along Orchard Road await you!
description: Experience the magic of Christmas on Orchard Road with a variety of pop-up events. From festive parties to live performances, there's something for everyone. Celebrate Christmas in Singapore from 16 – 22 Dec 2025. Don't miss The Great Christmas Eve Street Party on 24 Dec 2025, featuring music, lights, and vibrant energy. Enjoy live performances by Maia Lee, Mathilda D’Silva, and popular local bands. Orchard Road transforms into the ultimate festive playground, offering an unforgettable holiday experience for all ages. Revel in the dazzling backdrop of twinkling lights and festive cheer.
keyword_tag: Christmas, Orchard Road, pop-up events, street party, live music

title: The Great Christmas Eve Street Party on Orchard
blurb: Festive playground with music, lights, and celebration.
description: Orchard Road transforms into a festive playground with music, lights, and celebration. Dance the night away and soak up the holiday vibes. Enjoy live performances by Maia Lee, Mathilda D’Silva, and local bands, all set against twinkling lights and vibrant energy. This event is perfect for families and individuals looking to celebrate Christmas in a lively and engaging atmosphere. The street party offers a range of activities suitable for all ages, ensuring a memorable experience for everyone. Join the fun and revel in the magic of the season with dazzling displays and energetic performances.
keyword_tag: Christmas, street party, live music, family event
